fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, frame a player to be any GIM role of your choice for the night.
- At night, choose to create an illusion, selecting two targets. Your first target will appear as if they are visiting and attacking the second target (but will not have attacked them at all). They are not informed of this. The player who would be attacked is informed they were attacked and protected.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You appear innocent.
- When you die, you appear to be a role of your choice if you died at night.
